name: octopus (oubliette #5)
description:
note: a bug where the game fails to load and instead says "Cannot read property 'length' of null" will appear sometimes. often, refreshing the page a few times will fix it. if that doesn't resolve the problem, please try another browser!

space/enter - start the game

hold esc/h - quit the game (you can restart from menu)

arrows, or controller, or wsad - move around

there are no buttons other than movement controls and the start/quit game buttons

if you get stuck, quit and try again-

windows .exe available, but if you're rating for the jam, i have not yet received permission - consider this not a jam build for the moment: https://droqen.itch.io/octopus-oubliette-5-windows-build
